entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
